Main¶

The core python classes of the package. Classes are implemented in jupyter notebooks or in offline runs (optional).

Created on Fri Jul 3 11:30:16 2020 @author: hca

class source.main.Project(workdir, results, title='Untitled', hierarchy='protein', 'ligand', 'parameter', parameter=None, replicas=1, protein='protein', ligand='ligand', timestep=1)¶

Bases: object

Base class define a project.

workdirpath

The working folder. The default is Path(os.getcwd()).

titlestr

The title of the project. The default is “Untitled”.

hierarchyTYPE, optional

The ordered set of parameters to generate systems. The default is (“protein”, “ligand”, “parameter”). Note: For default value, folders will be protein-ligand-parameter/replicaN, with N being the replicate index.

parameterlist

The list of parameters. The default is “None”.

replicasint

Number of replicas contained within each parent_folder-parameter folder. The default is 1.

proteinlist

Name of the protein(s). The default is “protein”.

ligandlist

Name of the ligand(s). The default is “ligand”.

timestepint

The physical time of frame (ps). The default is 1.

resultspath

The path where results will be stored.

self: object

The project instance.

getProperties(*args) → str¶

Checks if queried properties is defined in self.

property: list

Variable(s) to que queried.

str

The value of property, if it is defined.

setSystems() → dict¶

Defines project systems based on hierarchy.

systemsdict

A dictionary of system names and instances as defined in the project (see class System).

class source.main.System(system, timestep, workdir='C:\\Users\\hcarv\\Documents\\GitHub\\SimFound_v2\\docs', replica_name='sim', linker='-')¶

Bases: object

The base class to define a system. Takes as input a system tuple. The system tuple can be accepted as a instance of the parent class or given manually. See parent class method setSystems for details of tuple generation.

A tuple of the form (‘protein’, ‘ligand’, ‘parameter’) or other with permutations of the elements (hierarchical, top first).

system: tuple

The tuple representing the system.

workdir: path

The default working directory.

replica_name: str

The prefix for replicate subsfolder. The default is ‘sim’.

linker: str

The file name delimiter. The default is ‘-‘.

systems: obj

An instance of System.

classmethod plot(input_df, level='l3')¶
class source.main.Visualize(results)¶

Bases: object

Class to visualize trajectories

viewer(base_name='superposed', stride=1)¶
